display_help: You can throw all of your might behind your shield and charge through ranks of foes in the blink of an eye. Using this power allows you to teleport to a selected area to deal significant smashing damage to all foes near the location you teleport to, most foes that are struck by your Shield Charge will be knocked down. Damage: Superior,
display_short_help: PBAoE Superior DMG(Smashing), Foe Knockdown; Self Teleport
